This graph shows the effect on the economy of the COVID-19 pandemic in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of April 15 , 2020 , by industry . During the survey , it was found that 29 percent respondents from the manufacturing industry stated that the coronavirus had a negative effect on their business , compared to 33 percent of those who stated no impact .
This statistic shows the number of employees in the water transport industry in Estonia from 2008 to 2009 . In 2009 there were 128 employees in the water transport industry .

This statistic shows the total Canadian value of shipments of rubber and plastics product manufacturing from 2014 to 2019 . In 2019 , the total Canadian shipment value of rubber and plastics products manufacturing reached approximately 12.6 billion U.S. dollars .

The statistic shows the percentage of adults worldwide who have an optimistic outlook on selected countries ' economic prospects in 2024 , by region . It can be seen that in North America 51 percent of respondents expected the United States economy to get better in two years time .

This statistic shows the value of shipments of rubber and plastic hose and conduit in the United States from 2010 to 2020 . In value terms , shipments of rubber and plastic hose and conduit in the U.S. increased to reach approximately eight billion U.S. dollars in 2020 .

This statistic shows the annual production value of the manufacture of solar cells and panels in Italy from 2008 to 2016 . In 2016 , the Italian solar cell and panel manufacturing industry produced an output worth approximately 5.31 billion euros .

As of January 2020 , the majority of respondents from Romania believed that the coronavirus would have an impact on the Romanian economy . 37 percent of respondents stated that the coronavirus outbreak would have a medium-high or very high impact on the Romanian economy .

The statistic shows the number of visitors to the United States in 2019 , by country of origin . In 2019 , approximately 10.7 million visitors came from Mexico , making it the leading country of origin .

In 2020 , the publishing industry in the United Arab Emirates generated a total turnover of 301.6 million Emirati dirhams . This was a decrease of approximately 33 million dirhams compared to the previous year . The publishing industry in the United Arab Emirates generated an employment rate of around 3,400 persons in 2020 .
This statistic shows the number of confirmed COVID-19 cases by state in the United States as of July 31 , 2020 . As of June , the most confirmed cases in the United States were in New York .

This statistic displays the number of people with type 1 diabetes in Iran from 2013 to 2020 . According to the data , the number of people living with the disease amounted to around 20.6 thousand in 2020 .

This statistic shows the direct contribution of travel and tourism to the economy in the United States from 2011 to 2018 , by type . Travel and tourism contributed over 1.2 trillion U.S. dollars in total economic output in 2017 .
This statistic shows the number of registered bus and coach overtaking accidents in Great Britain ( UK ) between 2010 and 2020 . The number of accidents decreased from 1,342 in 2013 to 770 in 2018 .

In 2020 , the employment rate in Sweden was 66.2 percent , which was an increase of 0.3 percentage points from 2019 . In the same year , the unemployment rate in Sweden was at 4.3 percent , which was an increase of 0.3 percentage points from 2019 .

This statistic presents the distribution of digital pirate site visits worldwide as of June 2020 , by device . During the survey period it was found that 34 percent of digital piracy visits were from mobile devices and 33 percent from desktop PCs .

This statistic illustrates the results of a survey on the use of online social networks for online dating purposes among young French adults in 2012 and 2013 . It appears that 18 to 24 year-old respondents are more likely to use online social networks for the purpose of online dating than those aged between 25 and 39 years .

According to an August 2021 survey among small business owners in the United States , 40 percent of respondents were planning to invest in their businesses in order to be better prepared for the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak . This was the highest percentage of all the investments considered .

According to a 2017 survey , 32 percent of respondents stated that they would not want to be a Google or YouTube employee because of the company  s alleged involvement with the U.S . Central Intelligence Agency . In comparison , 24 percent of the participants stated that they would not want to work for the tech giant because it is involved in the alleged manipulation of search and news algorithms .
This statistic shows the average number of goals scored during the 2019/2020 season in the Premier League by team . In total , 16 goals were scored in the Premier League .
This statistic shows the consumption of chocolate in France from 2008 to 2013 , by segment . Chocolate confectionery accounted for the highest consumption , with an annual growth of 4.3 percent .

This statistic displays the average weekly household expenditure on alcoholic beverages in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2018/19 , by gross income decile group . Spending on alcoholic beverages was higher for households in the lowest income decile group ( 11.26 British pounds ) , than those in the highest ( 23.94 British pounds ) .

In 2020 , the population in the age group of 15 to 29 years was estimated to amount to around 2.3 billion individuals worldwide . This is an increase of approximately 22 million people in comparison to the previous year , which was the highest growth among any age group .

In April 2020 , 44 percent of respondents in the United States reported that they were not going out as a result of the coronavirus outbreak . This statistic illustrates the share of Americans who stated they were not going out due to the coronavirus outbreak ( COVID-19 ) as of April 2020 .

The statistic shows the projected number of people aged 15-49 years in Myanmar from 2015 to 2040 , by type . There were an estimated 32.1 million people aged between 15 and 49 years in Myanmar in 2015 .
This statistic shows the natural gas consumption in the Netherlands from 2008 to 2019 . In 2019 , the natural gas consumption had decreased to approximately 56.49 billion cubic meters .

In 2020 , the largest number of drug addicts in the Russian Federation resided in the Moscow Region , where there lived 52,112 people with a drug addiction . The second largest amount of drug users lived in St. Petersburg , where there lived 40,988 drug addicts .
This statistic shows the number of employees in the transportation and storage industry in Denmark from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , the transportation and storage sector employed 84,221 people .

This statistic shows the percentage of individuals who used a mobile app or mobile internet for personal purposes in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015 . In 2015 72 percent of respondents used a mobile app to access their banking information , and 67 percent used an app for online shopping .

This statistic displays the energy consumption of electricity , gas , steam and air-conditioning supply industry in Finland from 2014 to 2018 , by fuel . In 2017 , the energy consumption of electricity , gas , steam and air-con units in Finland from the transport sector amounted to approximately 535,803 terajoules . This is the equivalent of around 225 thousand metric tons of oil equivalent .

This statistic shows the average weekly household expenditure on alcoholic drinks and tobacco in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2014 to 2017 , by gross income decile group . In 2016/17 , the average weekly expenditure on alcoholic drinks and tobacco amounted to 21.30 British pounds for the 8th to 10th income decile groups . The 12th decile spent 34.20 British pounds weekly on such goods .

The statistic shows the share of adults that had used social media to post or comment about a current event or a news item in the United States in 2019 , broken down by age group . During the survey 46 percent of the Millennials and 39 percent of the Gen X respondents said that they had used social media to post or comment about a current event or a news item .
The statistic shows the annual personnel costs for the mining industry in Russia from 2010 to 2016 . In 2016 , the mining industry had personnel costs of approximately 3.5 billion euros .

This statistic shows the total value of imports of the United Kingdom ( UK ) into the European Union ( EU 28 ) from 2010 to 2018 . EU trade with the UK amounted to approximately 120 billion British pounds in 2018 . This value decreased over the period of time under observation .
In 2019 , 16 percent of adults in the United States were able to speak a second language . In the same year , 20 percent of adults in the U.S. were able to speak a third or more language .

This statistic shows the average price of a bar of Alpro lactose free soy in the United Kingdom from January 2015 to March 2020 . The price of a bar of Alpro lactose free soy was 1.31 British pounds in March 2020 .

This statistic shows the number of people in the United Kingdom ( UK ) who were not satisfied with the amount of food they had available in 2014/2015 . The number of respondents who were not satisfied with the amount food available in their households was 10.4 million .
This statistic shows the number of employees of the air freight company Lufthansa worldwide from 2004 to 2018 . In 2018 , the Lufthansa group employed 43,330 people worldwide .
During a survey , 35 percent of respondents from South Korea stated that they would be willing to take on more work to support their employer during the COVID-19 pandemic .

This statistic shows the reasons why U.S. adults did not use online services in the past 12 months as of February 2014 . During the survey , 26 percent of respondents said they did not trust the Internet .

In the United States , the most common reason that respondents cited for using the online dating app Bumble , in 2020 , was that the dating app was the most efficient and successful way to date , with over one-third of respondents citing this as their reason .

This statistic shows the results of a survey among parents of children aged between five and 11 about their child 's participation in physical activity ( sports ) and exercise during the COVID-19 pandemic , by age and region in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2020 . 42 percent of parents of children aged between six and 11 in England reported that participation in PE at school has increased during COVID-19 compared to before .

In 2019 , the most commonly purchased mobile phone accessory was a protective case or cover , purchased by 78.4 percent of respondents in the United States that had bought a mobile device accessory in the previous year .
